name: Spinach and Beet Salad
author: Cooking Brunette
summary: I love to eat this salad with grilled chicken or BBQ steak. Great summer salad.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon balsamic creme (reduced balsamic vinegar), or as needed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
¼ cup French-fried onions (such as French's®)
¼ cup balsamic creme (reduced balsamic vinegar)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place beets in a roasting pan; drizzle with 1 teaspoon balsamic creme
Season with salt and black pepper
Roast beets in the preheated oven until tender, 30 to 40 minutes
Cut beets into bite-sized pieces; cool to room temperature
Combine spinach, walnuts, goat cheese, pickled red onion, and French-fried onions in a bowl
Whisk lemon juice, 1/4 cup balsamic creme, olive oil, salt, and black pepper in a bowl; pour over salad
